pr_title: 1781: Adding Sorting to the Scenario Table

timeline.message: Initial work to add the sorting, just need to deal with a NPE
Fixing the NPE caused by not updating the data properly
Refactoring to standardize and actually utilize the abstraction for scenario and unit market table models.
Adding a special sort for Scenario Status

timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: Fixed, just a dumb ordering decision on my part
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Could o1 and o2 be equal?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.bodyText: Comments for which is defeat and which is draw would be nice.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be more natural to have a helper method that converted the string to its sort order integer, then just compare the two integers.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.message: Modifying sorters based on code review

timeline.bodyText: This will fail on a null string, prefer Objects.equals here to make that case moot.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables
